plot: Jorge came in a flat running away from something. There he meets a young girl. Neither of them remember how they got there. They together discover that the place holds a horrible secret.
title: Terapia
plot_es: Jorge came in a flat running away from something. There he meets a young girl. Neither of them remember how they got there. They together discover that the place holds a horrible secret.
